title: Total Drama: Edge of Extinction
subtitle: All-Stars with Edge of Extinction twist

placements.name: Alejandro
placements.notes: 7 votes to win • 2 challenge wins • 2 immunity wins • 9 votes against

placements.name: Zoey
placements.notes: 6 votes to win • 4 challenge wins • 3 immunity wins • Idol (found Ep3; played Ep5 Pt2) saved Geoff; 7 votes cancelled • Only 1 vote received all season (cancelled by idol)

placements.name: Scott
placements.notes: 1 vote to win • Idol (found Ep6; played Ep14) perfect play; 3 votes cancelled

placements.name: Gwen
placements.notes: Lost fire-making • 4 challenge wins • 4 immunity wins • 13 votes against • 4 consecutive immunity wins (E11–14)

placements.name: Noah
placements.notes: 5-4 vote • Idol (found Ep2; played Ep5 Pt2) self-save

placements.name: Sierra
placements.notes: 8-4 (EoE return) • Idol (found Ep6; played Ep7) perfect play; 10 votes cancelled • 26 votes against

placements.name: Lightning
placements.notes: 9-4 vote • Idol (found Ep5; played Ep5 Pt2) self-save; 2 votes cancelled • 14 votes against

winner.name: Alejandro
winner.description: Strategic mastermind finally wins on his 3rd finals appearance; survived 9 votes against and edged out Zoey 7–6–1.

fanFavorite.name: Jo
fanFavorite.description: Most entertaining chaos agent; stirred rivalries and survived tie chaos to reach the jury.

bestStrategic.name: Alejandro
bestStrategic.description: Controlled the endgame and proved strategy can beat even dominant social bonds.

bestPhysical.name: Gwen
bestPhysical.description: Most dominant challenge run: four straight individual immunity wins (E11–14).

bestSocial.name: Zoey
bestSocial.description: Built unprecedented social capital with multiple unbreakable bonds and reached the finale with virtually no votes against.

mostClutch.name: Zoey
mostClutch.description: Made timely moves under pressure—idol save and late immunity wins to reach the closest finale ever.

mostLoyal.name: Zoey
mostLoyal.description: Stayed fiercely loyal to her core relationships (Mike and Geoff) and leveraged bonds to the end.

bestUnderdog.name: Geoff
bestUnderdog.description: Voted out twice yet kept fighting back—returned from EoE and still finished 6th.

biggestVillain.name: Sierra
biggestVillain.description: Returned from Edge of Extinction and immediately ignited conflict; perfect-idol chaos and relentless targeting.

mostChaotic.name: Jo
mostChaotic.description: Constant friction and big personality created the season’s most memorable chaos.

quietestThreat.name: Scott
quietestThreat.description: Played a patient, low-key game highlighted by a franchise-record idol hold and perfect timing.

seasonMVP.name: Alejandro
seasonMVP.description: Overall most impactful player: strategic control + clutch wins in the closest jury vote ever.

legacy.summary: Combined All-Stars (9 Gen 1, 9 Gen 2) with Edge of Extinction. Alejandro FINALLY won his crown on his 3rd finals appearance, defeating Zoey's unprecedented 3 unbreakable bonds with strategic mastery. The closest finale ever (7-6-1) proved that in modern gameplay, strategy defeats pure social bonds.
memorableMoments: Triple-idol tribal cancels all 9 votes (Ep5 Pt2)
Sierra’s perfect idol play cancels 10 votes (Ep7)
Jo earns Fan Favorite and survives tie chaos
Geoff voted out twice but still makes 6th
